column3: Everytime I went there, it was Winter.. i should visit Seoul in the spring time.. it looks beautiful

if you overcome PM2.5 & laziness, seoul is attractive place to ride
라파 공식영상에 서울이 소개되니 정말 자랑스럽습니다~ 박감독님과 배우분들 수고하셨습니다.
I'll be in Seoul at the end of June. I'm hoping to find a bike shop to rent a bike.  Anyone know of a shop to rent from?

Great film that brings back some fantastic memories of my time cycling in and around Seoul. I would whole heartedly recommend a bike-centric visit to Seoul, and the rest of Korea for that matter, to all cylists. There are so many lung busting climbs in beautiful wooded mountains to be had right on the doorstep of this amazing city, even within the boundaries of the city itself on Bugaksan. Take a trip to Seoul and toast your riding with a makgeolli, you won't regret it.
